channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump wants his name on the Washington Commanders’ planned $3.7 billion stadium, and he has ‘plenty of cards to play,’ report says
item.description: "He can make it very difficult, through government environmental approvals and other things, to make sure everyone who wants this stadium to be built ...

item.title: Trump keeps touting a Thanksgiving meal basket from Walmart that’s 25% cheaper. But it has half as many items as last year
item.description: This year's basket includes just 15 items compared to last year's 29. It is missing many dessert items, including a pecan pie, mini marshmallows and m...

item.title: Trump signals no shutdown compromise on the Affordable Care Act, calling it ‘the worst Healthcare anywhere in the world’
item.description: Trump suggested Congress send money directly to people to buy health insurance.

item.title: Billionaire Peter Thiel warns if you ‘proletarianize the young people,’ don’t be surprised they end up communist
item.description: "Capitalism is not working for a lot of people in New York City. It’s not working for young people."

item.title: It’s not about inflation or the economy — the election instead delivered a ‘wake-up call’ on affordability politics, top pollster says
item.description: "But make no mistake, how much you pay at the cash register is going to determine who you vote for in these elections."
